meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>moon</radical> is <radical>dry</radical>, it's good for your <kanji>liver</kanji>! Haha, get it? Because there's no moonshine to ruin your liver. Don't drink, kids.
readingMnemonic: As you pat your <kanji>liver</kanji> suddenly a strange feeling bubbles up and the ghost of Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん) comes out! Right out of your liver.
